greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: One eighth of deca-factorial numbers.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..320
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
program: (PARI) vector(20, n, prod(j=1,n, 10*j-2)/8 ) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(Sage) [product( (10*j-2) for j in (1..n))/8 for n in (1..20)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
(GAP) List([1..20], n-> Product([1..n], j-> 10*j-2)/8 ); # _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 11 2019
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
